channel.title: Project-PK 525 Project
channel.description:
Project- PK 525 BETA [b] Features[/b] *60% Trading (in Progress) *100% Dfs Spec *30% castle wars (in progress) *Added darkbow with double hit and projectiles. *Working Pm system *When login cool gfx like in runescape PVP worlds. *Basic Teles With Emote. *Bonuses *Max combat now 138 insteed of 126. *100% Dragon Bone burying and normal *Vengance *Bounty hunter *Prayer Working (working on draining after i finish trading) *Bank *All Dragon Specials *Vesta Long Special and Spear Special *Pvp Drops *Edge Pking *Statius spec + armor *Spirit sheilds *Mage bank (new) *Commands like ::master and ::commands and ::help are added. *and more i cant think of... [b]In Progress of[/b] ^Trading ^Mining ^Wc ^Teleblock nearly done ^Fixing Glitches [b]Development Team Head Coders[/b] -ggggg PICTURES. MB pk perfect PVP. [img]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-05-05_200958.png[/img] Mage bank with lever pulling. [img]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-05-05_201047.png[/img] PM i would say 99% only need to make the yellow text to green. [img]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-05-05_201147.png[/img] Banking almost 100% [img]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-05-03_163857.png[/img] DFS operate [img]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-05-03_164221.png[/img] pvp Drops! [img]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-05-03_164512-1.png[/img] Vengeance FTW! [img]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-05-03_164922-2.png[/img] bone burying. [img]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-05-03_164654-1.png[/img] char. look. [img]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-05-03_164242.png[/img] Darkbow double hit :P [img]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-05-03_164550-1.png[/img] [b]Want to be part of the team.[/b]

item.dc:creator: @dyllan95 dyllan95
item.description:
@dyllan95 wrote:

Name (Real name): Dyllan.
Part // In game mod.
Why i should choose you? i have my own server and i think i could help moderate your server and do a pretty good job at it too. my servers ip was g0dsrelm.no-ip.org. (i don’t run server anymore) i am also a very nice person and can help the new players and wont ever be mean to them.
Past experience (Links, Videos, Pictures) - ran my own server (as mentioned above), been moderator, admin on many servers.

hope i can get in guys.

Read full topic

item.title: Project-PK 525 Project
item.dc:creator: @ggggg ggggg
item.description:
@ggggg wrote:

Project- PK 525 BETA

Features
*60% Trading (in Progress)
*100% Dfs Spec
*30% castle wars (in progress)
*Added darkbow with double hit and projectiles.
*Working Pm system
*When login cool gfx like in runescape PVP worlds.
*Basic Teles With Emote.
*Bonuses
*Max combat now 138 insteed of 126.
*100% Dragon Bone burying and normal
*Vengance
*Bounty hunter
*Prayer Working (working on draining after i finish trading)
*Bank
*All Dragon Specials
*Vesta Long Special and Spear Special
*Pvp Drops
*Edge Pking
*Statius spec + armor
*Spirit sheilds
*Mage bank (new)
*Commands like ::master and ::commands and ::help are added.
*and more i cant think of…

In Progress of

^Trading
^Mining
^Wc
^Teleblock nearly done
^Fixing Glitches

Development Team
Head Coders
-ggggg

PICTURES.

MB pk perfect PVP.

Mage bank with lever pulling.

PM i would say 99% only need to make the yellow text to green.

Banking almost 100%

DFS operate

pvp Drops!

Vengeance FTW!

bone burying.

char. look.

Darkbow double hit

Want to be part of the team.
